job.title: Software Dev QA Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer & Network Security,Computer Software
job.description:
Fortinet is developing a powerful platform that combines the security for Enterprise, Datacenter and carrier solutions that enables organizations to efficiently manage, scale and secure their networks. The Software Development QA Engineer will be part of this exciting development and will be working with a strong technical team that has experience delivering NGFW solutions. Participate in building a IPS platform for Enterprise/Data centers/Carriers that provides high throughput packet processing using latest networking technologies.
Execute functional/performance testing on products using a combination of manual and auto-testing techniques
#GD
